name: The Factory (itch) (BrentMitchell)
description:
You've never left this place.

Now, it's leaving you.
Collect essentials for your journey beyond.

You're a young robot about to be sent into the 'beyond' and you have no idea what that entails. But for the moment, you can collect as much oil and power cores as you can find (or grab from drones), before your factory... leaves.
